nodes.text: Trapped (French: Pris au piège) is a chapter book adaptation of the Star Wars Rebels episode "The Siege of Lothal". Trapped was published by Hachette Jeunesse on March 9, 2016.

The rebels are back on Lothal for a mission of the utmost importance. But Agent Kallus takes the opportunity to set a trap for them! Wanted by the stormtroopers and hunted down by a mysterious Sith Lord, will Ezra and his friends manage to leave the planet unharmed?
